about_the_game:
Experience the thrill of Ion-Blade Racing League and dominate the tracks, in this thrilling racing arena shooter

  • Checkpoints Drones: Shoot down checkpoint to gain extra time and points.
  • Speed Matters: The faster you destroy them, the greater your score will be.
  • Tactical Shield: Activate your shield strategically to refill ammo and catch enemy lasers.
  • Unique Controls: Master the Move & Strafe, Rotate, Jump & Boost mechanics of the Ion-Blade hovercraft.
  • League Specifications: The standardized Ion-Blade hovercraft cannot be upgraded beyond league specifications.
  • Level Editor: Unleash your creativity and build custom tracks to share with friends and the community.
  • Ghost Mode: Record your runs, challenge friends to race against your offline ghost, and brag about your skills.

In this high-speed challenge, your accuracy, speed, and survival skills matter. No grinding for upgrades, just pure skill-based racing.
Join the amateur Ion-Blade league for a more relaxed experience, but remember, only the glorious will enter the eternal archives. Are you ready to leave your mark in the Ion-Blade Racing League?

name: Ion-Blade League Demo
short_description: Chase checkpoints as they evade you, shoot them down with lasers to gain time and points. Pilot the lightning-fast Ion-Blade hovercraft and engage in intense combat while blocking enemy fire and dodging obstacles. Can you conquer the challenge and emerge as a champion?
